ygData.subject: Re: Galvatron
ygData.msgSnippet: Galvatron looked at the bot fighting Prime. He said his name. How could he know who he was. He made a scan of the bot. He smiled. How perfect was this. Hot

 Galvatron looked at the bot fighting Prime. He said his name. How could he 
know who he was. He made a scan of the bot. He smiled. How perfect was this. 
"Hot Rod." His wings spread and a loud roar came from his mouth. "When you 
are done here Hot Rod. I'll be waiting. Ill destroy you with my bear hands!" 
he flew off. His masquito bot would stay behind and take some pics from the 
battle. Right now Galvatron had to get some rest. If he was to face Hot Rod 
if he survived the on comeing conflict then he need his sleep. He blasted 
towards the destron base.
